Package src

Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
src.Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
Represents a reservation made for this restaurant. A reservation must have a available staff and table.

    • Reservation

      public Reservation​(String staffID, String customerName, Timestamp timestamp, int contactNumber, int numPeople, int table, int reservationID)
      Creates a new reservation.
      Parameters:
      staffID - This Reservation's staff ID.
      customerName - This Reservation's customer name.
      timestamp - This Reservation's start time.
      contactNumber - This Reservation's customer contact number.
      numPeople - This Reservation's number of people.
      table - This Reservation's assigned table.
      reservationID - This Reservation's ID.

    • validateStaffID

      public boolean validateStaffID​(String StaffID)
      Checks if the staff ID is valid for this reservation.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Validity of this staff for this reservation.

    • validateStartTime

      public boolean validateStartTime​(Timestamp currentTime, Timestamp startTime, Timestamp openingTime, Timestamp closingTime)
      Checks if the start time is valid for this reservation. Ensures this reservation is made within booking hours.
      Parameters:
      currentTime - Real time when making this reservation.
      startTime - This reservation's start time.
      openingTime - Opening hour for this restaurant.
      closingTime - Closing hour for this restaurant.
      Returns:
      Validity of this reservation start time.
